trans-unit.source: Forces the current tool to be redrawn

seg-source.mrk: Forces the current tool to be redrawn

target.mrk: Forces the current tool to be redrawn

trans-unit.source: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

target.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

trans-unit.source: This will redraw the currently displaying tooltip, it will have no effect on a tool if it is not showing when you call this function.

seg-source.mrk: This will redraw the currently displaying tooltip, it will have no effect on a tool if it is not showing when you call this function.

target.mrk: This will redraw the currently displaying tooltip, it will have no effect on a tool if it is not showing when you call this function.
